meanings.sent1: The possessional rights were clearly defined in the contract.
meanings.sent2: She had a possessional instinct to keep everything in order.
meanings.sent3: His possessional obsession with collecting stamps was quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: The possessional bond between the dog and its owner was heartwarming.
meanings.sent5: The possessional nature of the relationship made it difficult to let go.

meanings.definition: Belonging to or owned by someone
meanings.sent1: The possessional items in the lost and found were waiting to be claimed.
meanings.sent2: The house had a possessional charm that made it feel like home.
meanings.sent3: The possessional mix-up of identical bags at the airport was a funny mistake.
meanings.sent4: Her possessional grip on the family heirloom was unyielding.
meanings.sent5: The possessional connection to the old photograph brought back memories.

meanings.sent1: The possessional dispute over the land was settled in court.
meanings.sent2: The possessional nature of the relationship made it complicated.
meanings.sent3: The possessional rivalry between siblings was always entertaining.
meanings.sent4: His possessional behavior towards his favorite toy was endearing.
meanings.sent5: The possessional struggle for power within the group caused tension.
